column1: Insertion of sensitive information into log files
column2: Writing sensitive information to log files can allow that information to be leaked to an attacker more easily.
column4: This [["potentially sensitive information"|"relative:///trafficReplayer/src/main/java/org/opensearch/migrations/replay/datahandlers/JsonAccumulator.java:62:49:62:53"]] is written to a log file.
